metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28596 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the Objparser::objparse() functionality of Prusa Research PrusaSlicer 2.2.0 and Master (commit 4b040b856). A specially crafted obj file can lead to code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: slic3r-prusa package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
